TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Check when an Overlay containing BSOs is first made available
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify if an Overlay containing BSOs can be exchanged.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an Overlay and assigns some BSOs to it. Nation B receives the Overlay and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic containing the Overlay and BSOs. Nation B has subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Overlay and all BSOs are displayed correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates some BSOs and puts them into an Overlay.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives the Overlay and displays the BSOs correctly.
